meta_description: The Elliott Museum offers a variety of collections, including vintage cars, baseball artifacts, artwork, Americana, rotating exhibits in the Changing Exhibitions Gallery, a Museum Store, and much more.

## INTERACT â€¢ LEARN â€¢ BE AMAZED

The Elliott Museum offers local history exhibits, temporary exhibits and a variety of collections to include vintage cars, baseball, artwork, Americana, and so much more.

Elliott Museum Exhibits, Events & Lectures

## DISCOVER â€¢ EXPERIENCE â€¢ ENGAGE

The Elliott Museum is becoming a cultural hub in the community offering a variety of opportunities to discover, experience, and engage through travel.

[Elliott Museum Travel Page](https://hsmc-fl.com/travel/)

# Complimentary Guide-ID devices in 4 languages

### What is Guide ID?

Guide ID is a **handheld audio guide device** that allows you to enjoy narrated insights about our exhibitsâ€”at your own pace. With **over 30 audio stops** located throughout the museum, it brings objects to life with stories, history, and fascinating details that go beyond the display labels.

### How Does It Work?

Itâ€™s as easy as **Point-and-Listen**!  
Just point the device at any marked exhibit and it will instantly play the corresponding audio clip.

### How Do I Get One?

Simply **ask for a Guide ID device at the front desk** when you arrive. Our staff will be happy to help get you started!
